meanings.definition: A white mineral consisting of calcium silicate.
meanings.sent1: The wollastonite sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Miners discovered a vein of wollastonite in the quarry.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook wollastonite for snow and tried to bury its acorn in it.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as pure and bright as wollastonite.
meanings.sent5: The artist used wollastonite to create a stunning sculpture.

meanings.definition: A mineral used in ceramics and as a filler in paints and plastics.
meanings.sent1: The factory imported wollastonite for their new ceramic collection.
meanings.sent2: Wollastonite is a key ingredient in many paint formulations.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the wollastonite was magical fairy dust.
meanings.sent4: His words were as smooth and polished as wollastonite.
meanings.sent5: The designer chose wollastonite to enhance the durability of the plastic.
